genresAdvancedInfo.name: sardinia indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Sardinia Indie is a genre of music that emerged from the island of Sardinia in Italy. It is characterized by its experimental and eclectic sound, which blends elements of traditional Sardinian music with indie rock, electronic, and world music influences. Sardinia Indie artists often sing in the Sardinian language, and their lyrics often explore themes of identity, culture, and social issues. The genre has gained a following both in Italy and internationally, and has helped to bring attention to the unique cultural heritage of Sardinia.
